ModMetaData.name: Defensive Moats
ModMetaData.author: Denni
ModMetaData.description:
Dig moats that are difficult to pass.
Had to be redone completely from first version, so the tiles now link.
Big thanks to Zylleon for the help with the code!
7.2.2020: Added Japanese translations by Proxyer 12.2.2020: Added Wooden Bridges
